name: Cheese
description: A classic cheese pizza with a rich tomato base and a generous layer of melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Vegetable
description: A fresh and flavorful combination of bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, black olives, and tomatoes, topped with a generous layer of mozzarella cheese.

name: Pepperoni
description: A flavorful pizza topped with zesty pepperoni slices over a bed of melted mozzarella cheese and a tangy tomato sauce.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: Tender grilled chicken marinated in smoky BBQ sauce, topped with red onions, green peppers, and melted cheese.

name: Mediterranean
description: A delicious combination of olives, feta cheese, tomatoes, red onions, and fresh basil, topped with a drizzle of olive oil.

name: Chicken and Cheese
description: A creamy mix of shredded chicken and mozzarella cheese, topped with a blend of Italian herbs for a rich and flavorful experience.

name: Chicken Tikka
description: A desi-style pizza with spicy chicken tikka chunks, onions, and green chilies, blended with tangy tomato sauce and cheese.

name: Ultimate
description: The ultimate pizza loaded with a variety of toppings including pepperoni, grilled chicken, mushrooms, onions, and bell peppers.

name: Continental
description: A European-inspired pizza with a light tomato base, roasted chicken, mushrooms, olives, and a hint of oregano.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: A rich and creamy pizza with Alfredo sauce, grilled chicken, mushrooms, and a blend of mozzarella and parmesan cheese.

name: Mushroom
description: A simple yet delicious pizza loaded with fresh mushrooms, mozzarella cheese, and a drizzle of garlic-infused olive oil.
